links.p: The accommodation capacity of the "Morava" restaurant is located on Vuk Karadžić Boulevard in the heart of Čačak. It offers 24 accommodation units and 4 LUX apartments, making it ideal for all kinds of celebrations. This modern event hall, which can accommodate up to 500 people, will impress you with its beautiful ambiance and national cuisine specialties.

Hotel "Beograd" is the only hotel located in the pedestrian zone in the city center of Čačak. The hotel’s accommodation capacity consists of 35 modernly equipped rooms and apartments with an elegant touch of tradition. Every part of the hotel is recognizable for its uniqueness, which our guests love and nurture, and creates a memorable experience even on the first visit.

Hotel "Kole" 3* is located in the Konjevići, just 3 km from the center of Čačak, along the Belgrade – Podgorica main road. This hotel offers peace, tranquility, and a pleasant, homely atmosphere, making it the perfect place for relaxation and escaping from everyday stress. An ideal destination for those who want to enjoy nature and comfort!

Hotel "Livade" 3* is located in Preljina, near the roundabout where the road from the Ibarska magistrale branches off to Čačak. Built in 1980, it is now one of the most famous hospitality establishments in Western Serbia. Modernly equipped rooms, excellent location, and professional, friendly staff will make your stay exceptionally pleasant. A perfect place for all types of guests!

"Zdravljak" is located in the heart of the Gornja Trepča spa, near the healing water springs and natural therapeutic site. The mineral waters with specific physical and chemical characteristics help in rehabilitation. We offer 32 beds in 16 double rooms. Our restaurant menu includes a variety of ready-made dishes, grilled dishes, and domestic cuisine specialties, ideal for every taste.

The oldest and most famous tavern in Čačak, founded in 1883, was renovated in 1903 and has preserved its original appearance. This tavern, which exudes the charm of the old Čačak bazaar, is a favorite gathering place. It is known for national cuisine specialties such as cornbread, cracklings, aspic, and grilled dishes. We also organize small celebrations for up to 90 people.

Restaurant "Plaža" is located by the Međuvršje lake, 15 km from the center of Čačak. This restaurant stands out with its rich selection of wines that perfectly complement dishes from both domestic and international cuisine. We proudly offer world-class dishes such as classic steak with grilled vegetables, 'Surf&Turf' steak, and tuna steak. We are also famous for our veal under the bell and fresh fish. Come and enjoy!

Restaurant "Lovac" is located in the Čačak municipality, near the city beach. With quality service and professional, friendly staff, your celebration here will be unforgettable. A long tradition and extensive experience in organizing celebrations make us the ideal choice for your special moments. Visit us and enjoy the unique atmosphere!

Caffe Restaurant "Proleće" is located in the center of Čačak, across from the city square. This beloved spot has gathered Čačak residents of all generations for years. After its renovation in 2018, Proleće became synonymous with unique and original hospitality offerings. Its distinctive exterior and industrial-style interior leave a strong impression on all guests, making every visit special.
